statements: SELECT * FROM user_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT review_id, user_id, song_id FROM user_reviews WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT album_id, rating FROM user_reviews WHERE album_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT review_text FROM user_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2021-01-01' AND review_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM user_reviews;
SELECT * FROM user_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC
SELECT user_id, album_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM user_reviews GROUP BY user_id, album_id HAVING avg_rating > 3
SELECT album_id, COUNT(review_id) AS num_reviews FROM user_reviews GROUP BY album_id ORDER BY num_reviews DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT album_id) AS num_albums FROM user_reviews GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY num_albums ASC
SELECT user_id, song_id, review_text FROM user_reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%amazing%' OR review_text LIKE '%awesome%' ORDER BY user_id, song_id ASC
SELECT * FROM albums
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums WHERE genre = 'Pop'
SELECT song_name, rating FROM songs ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE album_id = 1
SELECT * FROM albums WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums WHERE album_id = 5
SELECT album_name, COUNT(song_id) AS total_songs FROM albums JOIN songs ON albums.album_id = songs.album_id GROUP BY album_name
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, genre FROM songs GROUP BY genre HAVING AVG(rating) > 4
SELECT album_name, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM albums JOIN songs ON albums.album_id = songs.album_id GROUP BY album_name ORDER BY total_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM albums;
SELECT album_name, release_year FROM albums ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM albums;
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE duration > 180;
SELECT song_name, artist_name FROM songs WHERE album_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM albums ORDER BY release_year DESC, album_name ASC
SELECT song_name, artist_name, duration FROM songs WHERE duration > 180 ORDER BY duration DESC
SELECT album_name, genre FROM albums WHERE genre='Rock'
SELECT * FROM user_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC
SELECT song_name, artist_name, album_name FROM songs JOIN albums ON songs.album_id = albums.album_id
SELECT * FROM albums;
SELECT album_name, genre FROM albums WHERE release_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT song_name, artist_name FROM songs WHERE length > 300;
SELECT review_id, rating, review_date FROM user_reviews WHERE album_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM albums WHERE release_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT song_name, artist_name FROM songs WHERE length > 180 AND genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY song_name ASC;
SELECT album_name, COUNT(song_id) AS num_songs FROM albums JOIN songs ON albums.album_id = songs.album_id GROUP BY album_name HAVING num_songs > 10;
SELECT user_id, rating, review_text FROM user_reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM albums;
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT song_name, duration FROM songs ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT review_id, rating, review_text FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE duration > 300 ORDER BY song_name DESC
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums WHERE album_id = 3
SELECT user_id, username, join_date FROM users WHERE user_id < 100 ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4 AND album_id = 5
SELECT song_name, duration, albums.album_name FROM songs JOIN albums ON songs.album_id = albums.album_id
